name: Plandzz
description:
Plandzz is a game where you need to solve both simple and challenging puzzles, arrange all the pieces to get a whole block.

▪ Interesting puzzles
▪ Pleasant music
▪ Steam achievements
▪ Bargain price

Coming soon:
▪ Steam trading cards

Controls:
▪ Move - Left mouse button
▪ Rotate - Right mouse button
